titles.title: Come, Ye Sinners, Poor and Needy

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, ye sinners, poor and needy, weak and wounded, sick and sore; Jesus ready stands to save you, full of pity, love and pow'r.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come, ye thirsty, come, and welcome, God's free bounty glorify; true belief and true repentance, ev'ry grace that brings you nigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let not conscience let you linger, nor of fitness fondly dream; all the fitness He requireth is to feel your need of Him.
